Emerge {5}{B}{R}{G} [i](You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature’s mana value.)[/i]
Whenever Heaving Charnel attacks, exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a tapped and attacking token that’s a copy of it, except its a 5/5 black Maggot and has no mana cost.
You may cast Heaving Charnel from your graveyard using its emerge ability.
